name: FENRIR
description:
CREATED FOR AWFUL WINTER JAM 2018 - MADE IN 16 DAYS

BEST VIEWED IN 1600 X 900 WINDOWED FOR THE TIME BEING

  • Windows only.

CONTROLS:

WASD - move

SPACE - jump

LEFTSHIFT - howl

F - attack

X - dash

ESC - pause/exit

You destroy, but for what purpose? A sign of end times, or just a really angry pupper? Find out in this short single-player experience, created in just 16 days.

  • Destroy houses, trees and windmills for points with your FIRE BREATH.
  • Running into fire spouts will deduct points.

- - - - You are being watched.

IMPORTANT POINTS:

  • Most of the development period was spent trying to adjust the collision of Fenrir himself. While I managed to get it more stable than it was, there are still faults when jumping too much or staying too close to walls. (Possibly due to the size of the model itself.)
  • Actual bosses and enemies will come post-jam, as I ran out of time to model, animate and code them in. Consider this more of a tech demo of things to come.
  • This was very experimental, and I am very glad I was able to create something like this.
